supportRequestSentMessage: Your support request has been sent. Our team will get back to you soon.
failedToSendSupportRequest: Failed to send support request. Please try again.
myOrderIsLate: My order is late, what should I do?
myOrderIsLateAnswer: Contact our support team immediately. We will track your order and provide updates.
wrongAddressDeliveryAnswer: Please verify your delivery address in the app. Contact support if the address is correct but delivery went to wrong location.
deliveryPersonNotRespondingAnswer: Call our support number for immediate assistance with delivery issues.
foodQualityNotGoodAnswer: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact support with photos and details for a full refund.
foodTooSpicyAnswer: You can adjust spice levels in your food preferences. Contact support if you need immediate assistance.
foodArrivedColdAnswer: We ensure hot food delivery. Contact support for a replacement or refund.
cantLoginAnswer: Try resetting your password or contact support for account recovery assistance.
subscriptionNotWorkingAnswer: Check your subscription status in the app. Contact support if the issue persists.
paymentFailedAnswer: Check your payment method and try again. Contact support if the issue continues.
howToCancelSubscriptionAnswer: Go to your profile > subscription details > cancel subscription. Contact support if you need help.
generalQuestionsAnswer: We're here to help! Contact our support team for any questions or feedback.
howToRateMealAnswer: After receiving your meal, go to Orders > Rate Meal. Your feedback helps us improve.
howToChangeDeliveryTimeAnswer: Go to your profile > delivery preferences to set your preferred delivery times.
